title: Wear Boy Facepak
summary: Wear Boy is a custom watch face for the Android Wear application Face.
description: Wear Boy is a custom watch face for the Android Wear application Face.*YOU MUST HAVE THE APP "FACE" TO USE THIS FACE https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=boxcrab.face
descriptionHTML:
Wear Boy is a custom watch face for the Android Wear application Face.

*YOU MUST HAVE THE APP "FACE" TO USE THIS FACE
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=boxcrab.face
comments: Issues Update still present with background issue. Screen goes black and only the white text shows..no time ect.
No 24 hour support! Add 24 hour support please
Can't install on watch Just doesn't appear....
